I feel so far from the The Kuntry Killaz right now....

Hick-Hop: Hip-Hop Meets the Hollow
Kickin' It in Rural Kentucky with the Rap Group Kuntry Killaz

March 27, 2004 -- It began when prisoners from urban jails were moved to new "supermax" facilities in rural Appalachia. The racial tension between white corrections officers and black inmates could be felt throughout the community....
